name: Finite Battle
description:
Finite Battle

A rock-paper-scissor game for time-wasting or relaxing activity.

How To's
  1. Both Player and Enemy has 100 HP and 50 max Mana.
  2. Pick your action before the time runs out.
  3. If so, your action will be picked randomly.
  4. The rule is based on rock-paper-scissor game.
  5. if your HP gets 0 then you lose and vice-versa.
  6. if your mana gets full then your next action will give double damage.
  7. every action gives different damage and mana recharge.
Actions

Here are the lists of actions with damage and mana:

  1. Rock ==> Damage : 10, Mana: 2
  2.  Paper ==> Damage: 5, Mana: 5
  3.  Scissor ==> Damage: 7, Mana: 3
